title: Effective teaching method design through text complexity and cognitive load assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cognitive science theories, comprehension of Lexile levels, and foundational knowledge of instructional design
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers practice scientifically evaluating cognitive load when designing lessons using materials of varying text complexity in a VR simulation environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between cognitive load indicators (beta/theta/alpha brainwaves) and texts of varying Lexile indices
Learners can design a text-reading-recall experiment in a VR environment to develop a protocol for measuring cognitive processing levels.
Learners can propose text-complexity-based instructional strategies tailored to learners' proficiency levels based on analytical results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
